QuestData.Title: Dire News
QuestData.Description: Azeroth was right in sendin' us here, $n. We have to stop whatever it is Sargeras is plannin', or we may not have a home left to save when this is all over.$B$BYe should go back to Turalyon and let him know what ye've seen. I'll stay here and see if I can't glean anything else that might help us.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return to Turalyon on the Vindicaar.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Turalyon on the Vindicaar.
QuestData.RewardText: What did Magni have to show you?
